explains: n. 刺绣技法，刺绣活儿；绣花，刺绣品；夸张之词，渲染成分
wordGroup: embroidery machine 绣花机；刺绣机
machine embroidery 机绣；绣花机；电绣
embroidery thread 绣花线；刺绣用线

sentences.en: She learned sewing, knitting, and embroidery.
sentences.cn: 她学过缝纫、编织和刺绣。

sentences.en: The shorts had blue embroidery over the pockets.
sentences.cn: 这条短裤口袋上有蓝色的刺绣。

sentences.en: "Where did you get that embroidery?"—"I made it myself."
sentences.cn: “你从哪儿得到那件刺绣的？”“我自己做的。”
